channel.title: Portals :p
channel.description:
i have asked before on here but no one replied to asking again.... i have managed to add all the portals i want and they all work perfect etc... but what i cant figure out is how to name the portals... so like when u mouse over them it says the name.... like "clan portal" "pking" etc etc.
i will appreciate any help that you can offer..
thanks for looking...
Nic

I F*CKING LOVE YOU!!! <3!!!- TYSM :)

item.title: Portals :p
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

yea i thought it was client side… but on looking i dont have a “class43_sub1.java” tis weird lol… thanks anyways.

before anyone says like yeaaaa u didnt no but just saying it to look good… i did know because if you log in on like a mopar client and look at portals they just named portal… but on mine they have proper names

Read full topic

item.title: Portals :p
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

jarnohhh:

U can"t. U need to set npcs that talking it. It can be… but than u need ur own client.

Yes. Client side. The client tells the names of objects, items and NPC’s, in client folder it should be something like…

class43_sub1.java

Something like that anyway.

Read full topic
